tickets_created.description:
Critical vulnerability detected by FixOps

*Vulnerability Details:*
- CVE: CVE-2021-44228
- Package: log4j-core
- Installed Version: 2.14.1
- Fixed Version: 2.17.1
- CVSS Score: 10.0
- EPSS Score: 0.97565
- KEV Listed: Yes

*Affected Application:*
- Application: payment-gateway
- Environment: production
- Compliance Impact: PCI-DSS 6.3.1

*Remediation:*
Upgrade log4j-core to version 2.17.1 or later

*FixOps Correlation ID:* CORR-LOG4J-001

Critical vulnerability detected by FixOps

*Vulnerability Details:*
- Type: SQL Injection
- CWE: CWE-89
- OWASP: A03:2021
- File: src/main/java/com/payment/dao/TransactionDAO.java
- Line: 145

*Code Snippet:*
{code:java}
String query = "SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE id = '" + transactionId + "'";
{code}

*Remediation:*
Use PreparedStatement with parameterized queries

*FixOps Correlation ID:* CORR-SQL-001

Critical vulnerability detected by FixOps

*Vulnerability Details:*
- Type: Hardcoded Credentials
- CWE: CWE-798
- OWASP: A07:2021
- File: src/identity/auth/jwt_handler.py
- Line: 12

*Compliance Impact:*
- SOC2 CC6.6
- GDPR Art.32

*Remediation:*
Move JWT secret to environment variable or secrets manager

*FixOps Correlation ID:* CORR-CRED-002

Critical vulnerability detected by FixOps

*Vulnerability Details:*
- Type: Broken Access Control (IDOR)
- CWE: CWE-639
- OWASP: A01:2021
- Endpoint: /fhir/Patient/{id}/records

*HIPAA Impact:*
- 164.312(a)(1) - Access Control
- 164.308(a)(4) - Information Access Management

*Remediation:*
Implement proper authorization checks for all patient data access

*FixOps Correlation ID:* CORR-IDOR-001

Critical vulnerability detected by FixOps

*Vulnerability Details:*
- CVE: CVE-2024-23829
- Package: celery
- Installed Version: 5.2.7
- Fixed Version: 5.3.5
- CVSS Score: 9.8

*Compliance Impact:*
- SOC2 CC7.1
- ISO27001 A.12.6.1
- GDPR Art.32

*Remediation:*
Upgrade celery to version 5.3.5 or later

*FixOps Correlation ID:* CORR-CELERY-001
